columns.text: The Suites present a balance of comfort, and unparalleled style. Great attention has been given to the exterior design. The result is a unique combination of the traditional Cycladic style with a blend of modern comfort. All five Honeymoon suites are facing the sea and consist of comfortable king size beds in a cozy and modern atmosphere.

items.title: Love Suite
items.description: Minimal design with traditional Cycladic features, enjoying views of the caldera, sunset and the sea.
items.excerpt: Minimal design with traditional Cycladic features, enjoying views of the caldera, sunset and the sea.
items.seo_title: Love Suite | Rooms | Alta Vista Suites Santorini
items.seo_description: The Love Suite has a 60 sq.m interior, traditional Cycladic features, a built-in sofa, sundeck & pool, sea & Caldera views. Book this for your honeymoon now!
items.small_info: Up to 4 Guests/ Caldera / Sea View

items.title: Heart Suite
items.description: With an amazing sundeck, situated on the upper level, Heart is a double bed Suite offering uninterrupted views of the Caldera cliff side and sunset, all year round.
items.excerpt: With an amazing sundeck, situated on the upper level, Heart is a double bed Suite offering uninterrupted views of the Caldera cliff side and sunset, all year round.
items.seo_title: Heart Suite | Rooms | Alta Vista Suites Santorini
items.seo_description: The Heart Suite has a double bed, unique corridor bathroom, an amazing sundeck & pool. Sea views from bedroom. Book this for your honeymoon today!

items.title: Passion Suite
items.description: With sundeck, situated on the upper level, Passion Suite is a double bed suite offering uninterrupted views of the Caldera cliff side and Sunset, all year round.
items.excerpt: With sundeck, situated on the upper level, Passion Suite is a double bed suite offering uninterrupted views of the Caldera cliff side and Sunset, all year round.
items.seo_title: Passion Suite | Rooms | Alta Vista Suites Santorini
items.seo_description: The Passion Suite is on the upper level with a double bed, sun terrace & pool. Stunning views of sea & Caldera. Book this for your honeymoon now!

items.title: Senses Suite
items.description: Honeymoon Senses Suite is the perfect choice for guests who wish to embrace the site of Caldera as well as delightful swimming pool vistas.
items.excerpt: Honeymoon Senses Suite is the perfect choice for guests who wish to embrace the site of Caldera as well as delightful swimming pool vistas.
items.seo_title: Senses Suite | Rooms | Alta Vista Suites Santorini
items.seo_description: The Senses Suite has a double bed, built-in sofa, sun terrace & pool. Uninterrupted views of the sea & Caldera. Book this for your honeymoon today!

items.title: Bebe Suite
items.description: Situated on the pool level, Bebe Suite offers uninterrupted views of the Caldera.
items.excerpt: Situated on the pool level, Bebe Suite offers uninterrupted views of the Caldera.
items.seo_title: Bebe Suite | Rooms | Alta Vista Suites Santorini
items.seo_description: The Bebe Suite has a double bed, a sun terrace with loungers, chairs and table & a pool. Panoramic views of sea & the Caldera. Book this for your honeymoon now!

SEO.title: Rooms | Alta Vista Suites Santorini | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Check out the luxury rooms of Aqua Vista Hotel's Alta Vista Suites, centrally located in the village of Imerovigli, Santorini.
